name: Xiang Tong
story: Tao Yeung was born and raised in Hong Kong. He joined the military at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks due to his strong leadership skills and unwavering dedication to his country. As a Squad Leader, he is respected by his peers and feared by his enemies. His disciplined personality keeps his squad in line and his tactical brilliance ensures their success in every mission. Though he misses his wife and children back home, he knows that his duty to his country comes first.
